front.title: Use Cases for Content Distribution Network Interconnection

abstract.t: Content Delivery Networks (CDNs) are commonly used for improving the footprint and the end-user experience of a content delivery service, at a reasonable cost. This document outlines real world use-cases (not technical solutions) for interconnecting CDNs. The intention is to motivate CDN Interconnection and to support the case for formation of a Working Group, which would work on the definition of standardized, inter-operable method(s) for interconnecting CDNs.
